project_info.name: Project Oracle
project_info.description: A multi-agent AI system demonstrating RAG capabilities and agent collaboration

setup.title: Setup Guide
setup.content:
1. Create a virtual environment -> python -m venv venv
2. Activate the virtual environment -> .\venv\Scripts\Activate
3. Install the requirements -> pip install -r requirements.txt
4. Run the app -> python main.py

architecture.title: System Architecture
architecture.content:
Project Oracle uses a multi-agent system where specialized agents collaborate to handle different types of queries. The system includes:
- Onboarding Specialist
- Technical Advisor
- Process Guide
Agents can access documentation and hand off conversations to other agents when appropriate.

git_workflow.title: Git Workflow
git_workflow.content:
1. Initialize repository -> git init
2. Add files to staging -> git add .
3. Commit changes -> git commit -m 'message'
4. Create new branch -> git checkout -b branch-name
5. Switch branches -> git checkout branch-name
6. Push to remote -> git push -u origin branch-name
7. Pull latest changes -> git pull origin branch-name

project_requirements.title: Project Documentation Requirements
project_requirements.content:
The project requires comprehensive documentation across multiple levels:

1. High Level Documentation
- Project overview
- System architecture
- User guides

2. Developer Level Documentation
- Technical specifications
- API documentation
- Setup guides
- Code standards

3. Project Management Level
- Project roadmap
- Sprint planning
- Resource allocation

All documentation should be maintained in markdown format within the docs folder.

general.question: What is Project Oracle?
general.answer: Project Oracle is a demonstration of RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) capabilities using a multi-agent system. It showcases how AI agents can collaborate and use documentation to provide informed responses.

general.question: How do I start contributing?
general.answer: Begin by following the setup guide, reviewing the architecture documentation, and following the git workflow guidelines. The Onboarding Specialist can guide you through this process.

technical.question: How does the agent system work?
technical.answer: The system uses specialized agents (Onboarding, Technical, Process) that can access documentation and hand off conversations to each other based on the query context. Each agent has specific expertise and can retrieve relevant information from the knowledge base.

project_scope.title: Project Scope
project_scope.description:
A chatbot system using LLMs to help users with their questions about the project. The system features:
- Multi-agent architecture
- RAG capabilities for context-aware responses
- Documentation retrieval and integration
- Interactive chat interface
